name: wtr-lab-novel-image-generator
description: A powerful userscript to enhance web novel reading on WTR-LAB.COM. Select text to generate AI-powered images using multiple providers (Pollinations, AI Horde, Google Imagen, OpenAI). Features Gemini-enhanced prompts, 100+ art styles, a modern UI, history, and robust configuration options. Built with Webpack for modularity and maintainability.

scripts.build: npm run format && npm run lint:check && npm run version:update && webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:performance: npm run format && npm run lint:check && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:greasyfork: npm run format && npm run lint:check && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:devbundle: npm run format && npm run lint:check && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix

author: MasuRii
